str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and choreo; to retire.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Of Hebrew origin; Galiloea, a region of Palestine.
